definition: tide of thought/way of thinking characteristic of a historical period/Zeitgeist
thoughts surging in one's mind (idiom)/different thoughts coming to mind

sentences.english: The emergence of back modern thought isin favor of the development of individuality.
sentences.chinese: 后现代思潮的出现有利于个性的自由发展。

sentences.english: During the Song Dynasty, reforming became the main current in the intellectual and political circle.
sentences.chinese: 两宋时期，求变思潮成为思想界与政治界的主流。

sentences.english: He is now a researcher at Instiute For Arts & Literature Trend of People's University of China.
sentences.chinese: 现任中国人民大学文艺思潮研究所研究员。

sentences.english: The papers of ideological trend about modern literature are increasing now.
sentences.chinese: 目前在现代文学方面研究文学思潮的文章逐步增多。

sentences.english: The anti-Russia movement became the immediate cause for this educational idea's coming into existence.
sentences.chinese: 拒俄运动为军国民教育思潮形成的直接原因。

sentences.english: This subject surveys the main currents of European cultural and intellectual history in the modern period.
sentences.chinese: 本科目概括当代欧洲文化与知识份子历史的主要思潮。

sentences.english: Nationalism literary thoughts is one of major phenomena in Orient literature of 20th Century.
sentences.chinese: 民族主义文学思潮是20世纪东方文学的重要现象。

sentences.english: Put your thoughts into some trendy new ideas.
sentences.chinese: 可把心思放在现今流行的新思潮上。

sentences.english: Post-modern trend of thought has imposed a vehement impact on historical research.
sentences.chinese: 后现代思潮对历史研究形成了强烈的冲击。

sentences.english: Wu-Xu thoughts of "save the nation from extinction" and "enlightenment" promoted the trend of "history revolution".
sentences.chinese: 戊戌救亡启蒙思潮催动了“史学革命”潮流。

sentences.english: History positivism thought back in the early years of the 20th century has spread in China.
sentences.chinese: 实证主义史学思潮早在20世纪初年就已在中国传播。

sentences.english: These emotions and trend of thoughts were embodied in the culture and art.
sentences.chinese: 这种情绪和思潮在文化艺术中得到体现。

sentences.english: The research about literary trend can reveal the rule of literary development.
sentences.chinese: 研究文学思潮更能反映出文学的发展流变的规律。

sentences.english: After the War of Resistance Against Japan broke out, the thought of quintessence of Chinese traditional music declined rapidly too.
sentences.chinese: 抗战全面爆发后，国粹主义音乐思潮也迅速走向衰落。

sentences.english: Albert's thoughts whirled, and he was thrilled and excited.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔伯特思潮起伏，心情激动。

sentences.english: Futurism , an early twentieth-century movement in art, rejected all traditions and at.
sentences.chinese: 未来主义，二十世纪早期的一个艺术思潮。

definition: nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism
